dcterms:description: The Visual Dialog dataset (VisDial) is designed for the Visual Dialog task, where an agent interacts with another agent through natural language based on an image. It includes multiple rounds of question-answer pairs, allowing for a conversational context that can help in answering questions about the image.
dcterms:title: Visual Dialog (VisDial)
